name: Fungal Overgrowth District
description: A once-bustling commercial block now consumed by pulsating fungal growths. The skeletal remains of storefronts peek through veils of bioluminescent tendrils. Underground tunnels breathe beneath cracked pavement, their metallic groans echoing through the ruins. The air hums with dangerous spores that cling to every surface.

points_of_interest.name: Pharmacy Ruins
points_of_interest.description: Shattered medicine cabinets with some intact supplies behind fungal barriers

points_of_interest.name: Subway Breach
points_of_interest.description: Collapsed tunnel entrance with faint glowing tendrils reaching upward

points_of_interest.name: Infested Apartments
points_of_interest.description: Three-story building with fungal vines bursting through windows

points_of_interest.name: Emergency Broadcast Tower
points_of_interest.description: Tilted metal structure still emitting sporadic static

special_features: Bioluminescent fungal growths that pulse at night
